```{r}
library(stargazer)
```


```{r}
df.1 <- read.csv("data_regressions/test.csv", encoding = "UTF-8")
df.1
```




```{r}
model.1 <- lm(scale(value_y) ~ scale(value_x), data = df.1)
model.2 <- lm(scale(value_y) ~ scale(averaged_values_y), data = df.1)
model.3 <- lm(scale(value_y) ~ scale(value_x) + scale(averaged_values_y), data = df.1)
# model.2 <- lagsarlm(value_y ~ value_x + averaged_values_x + averaged_values_y, data = df.1, listw = geow)

stargazer(model.1, model.2, model.3, type = "text")
```
```{r}
moran.plot(df.1$value_y, listw=geow, xlab="Standardized Divisiveness", ylab="Neighbors Standardized Divisiveness",
main=c("Moran Scatterplot") )
```
